QuestData.Title: A Fine Journey
QuestData.Description:
Aspirants new and ancient, take note! The heralded Agthia's Repose calls.
Make the ceremonial journey and learn about the ancient fallen Paragon who saved this very realm!
Find the Repose just a short ride southwest of Hero's Rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Keeper Mnemis in Agthia's Repose.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Keeper Mnemis in Agthia's Repose.
